2025.title: Multimodal AI Systems
2025.description: Next-generation AI models like GPT-5 and Gemini 1.5 can process text, images, audio, and video together — enabling applications such as AI-driven video editors, assistants, and smart agents.

2025.title: Generative Agents
2025.description: AI agents that combine LLMs with memory, reasoning, and tool-use capabilities to perform complex tasks autonomously — a major step toward real-world AI integration.

2025.title: Diffusion Model Frameworks
2025.description: Frameworks such as Hugging Face Diffusers and ComfyUI streamline the process of training and deploying text-to-image and video generation models.
